title: Eastpoint Mall Family-Friendly Activities and Stores
blurb: Discover family fun at Eastpoint Mall in Simei today!
description: Eastpoint Mall offers a variety of family-friendly activities and stores. Explore retail options, dining experiences, and community events suitable for families with children. The mall provides a comfortable and convenient environment for shopping and leisure. Visit the customer service counter on Level 2 for assistance and information. Enjoy a day out with your family at Eastpoint Mall, with amenities and services designed to cater to your needs. Discover promotions, store offers, and events happening within the mall. Eastpoint Mall aims to provide a welcoming and enjoyable experience for all visitors, including families with young children. The mall is open from 10am to 10pm daily.
full_address: Eastpoint Mall 3 Simei Street 6 Singapore 528833 (65) 6587 7200 Get Directions Customer Service Counter Level 2 Opening Hours: 10am - 10pm Redemption Hours: 10am - 9

title: Eastpoint Mall Family Activities and Amenities
blurb: Explore family-friendly activities at Eastpoint Mall.
description: Eastpoint Mall offers a variety of amenities and activities suitable for families with children. These include a customer service counter, family parking spaces, and nursing rooms. The mall also hosts events and promotions throughout the year that cater to families. Check the 'What’s On' section for the latest updates on kid-friendly activities, workshops, and entertainment options available. The mall aims to provide a comfortable and convenient shopping experience for families.

title: Eastpoint Mall Family-Friendly Amenities and Services
blurb: Discover family-friendly amenities at Eastpoint Mall.
description: Eastpoint Mall offers a range of amenities and services catering to families. These include nursing rooms, diaper changing stations, and kid-friendly dining options. The mall also hosts various events and activities suitable for children and families throughout the year. Check the website for specific details on upcoming events and promotions. Eastpoint Mall strives to provide a comfortable and convenient shopping experience for families with young children. The mall also features play areas and child-friendly facilities to keep the little ones entertained while parents shop or dine. With a variety of retail outlets and dining options, Eastpoint Mall is a one-stop destination for families.

title: Eastpoint Mall Family-Friendly Activities and Venues
blurb: Explore family-friendly activities and venues at Eastpoint.
description: Eastpoint Mall offers a variety of family-friendly activities and venues suitable for kids and parents. From indoor playgrounds to dining options, discover engaging experiences for the whole family. Enjoy a day of fun and entertainment with dedicated play areas and amenities designed to cater to families with children. Explore various retail and dining options that cater to families, ensuring a convenient and enjoyable experience for all visitors. Eastpoint Mall provides a welcoming environment for families to create lasting memories together. Discover the perfect blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment for a memorable family outing.
